citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1145 on
27-JUL-17.
Spoke to the licensee. The licensee stated there was no one available at that time to accompany Animal Care
Inspector for an inspection.
